category.title: Grade 1
category.description: Negligible to slight damage: no structural damage, just slight, non-structural damage. I.e. cracks, loose stones, etc.

category.title: Grade 2
category.description: Moderate damage: slight structural damage, moderate non-structural damage. I.e. cracks in many walls, collapsed chimneys.

category.title: Grade 3
category.description: Substantial to heavy damage: moderate structural damage, heavy non-structural damage. I.e. Large and extensive cracks, missing roof tiles, etc.

category.title: Grade 4
category.description: Very heavy damage: heavy structural damage, very heavy non-structural damage. I.e. fallen walls, roofs or floors

category.title: Grade 5
category.description: Grade 5  Destruction : very heavy structural damage, can be total or near total collapse
